Language to Use When Denying the Request to Substitute
When denying a request to substitute be sure to provide the specific reason for denial in the notification letter.
The letter should also include any of the three findings potentially relevant to a denial explained in
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, 3.C.5.b
.
